TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContractReference extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference

Docs.summary: Represents a reference in a discovery document to a service description.

remarks.format:
## Remarks XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available Web Services given an URL. The URL usually points to a discovery document, which typically has a.disco file name extension. Within a discovery document are references to information about the existance of XML Web services. These references can refer to service descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas or other discovery documents. This class represents a reference to a Service Description.
Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes: `ref` and `docRef`. The `contractRef` element must have an XML namespace matching the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Namespace> constant, whereas the `ref` and `docRef` attributes are placed in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> properties.
## Examples [!code-cpp[ContractReference#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.di_3_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ContractReference#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.di_3_1.vb)] [!code-cs[ContractReference#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.di_3_1.cs)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class using the specified reference name.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`Ref`|The `href` parameter that represents the reference name.|

Docs.param: The URL for a service description. Initializes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property value.
The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description at `href`. Initializes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> property value.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the supplied references to a service description and a XML Web service implementing the service description.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class using the specified reference name and `docRef`.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |`Ref`|The `href` parameter that represents the reference name.| |`DocRef`|The `docRef` parameter that represents the DocRef.|

Docs.summary: Gets a object representing the service description.
Docs.value: A object representing the service description.
Docs.exception: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> does not contain a discovery document with an URL of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Url%2A>.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the file to use by default when saving the referenced service description.
Docs.value: Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced service description to a file.

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description referenced in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property.
Docs.value: The URL for a XML Web service implementing the Service Description referenced in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table.
|Attribute|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |ref|The URL for the service description. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.| |docRef|The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute. The DocRef property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.|
## Examples The following code example sets the DocRef property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
[!code-cs[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.di_33_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.di_33_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ContractReference_Reference#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.di_33_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: XML namespace for service description references in discovery documents.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element, which is a part of the XML namespace specified in the Namespace constant.
## Examples The following code example outputs to the console the value of the Namespace constant.
[!code-cs[ContractReference_Reference#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/f-system.web.services.di_1_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[ContractReference_Reference#4](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/f-system.web.services.di_1_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ContractReference_Reference#4](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/f-system.web.services.di_1_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL to the referenced service description.
Docs.value: The URL to the referenced service description.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Within a discovery document, a reference to a service description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table.
|Attribute|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |ref|The URL for the service description.The Ref property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.| |docRef|The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.DocRef%2A> property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.|
## Examples The following code example sets the Ref property of a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>.
[!code-cs[ContractReference_Reference#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.di_26_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[ContractReference_Reference#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.web.services.di_26_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ContractReference_Reference#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.services.di_26_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Resolve (string contentType, System.IO.Stream stream);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Resolve(string contentType, class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

Docs.summary: Resolves whether the the referenced document is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the MIME type is `text/xml` and the contents of `stream` is a Service Description, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.

Docs.exception:
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> property is .
-or-
The service description could not be downloaded and verified successfully.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Url { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL for the referenced Service Description.
Docs.value: The URL for the referenced service description.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference> class, the Url property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference.Ref%2A> property.
